name: Send new HubSpot CRM contacts to an external service via HTTP request
description: Effortlessly streamline your communication process with this template. Every time a new contact is added to a specific list in HubSpot CRM, Make will automatically send the contact data to your desired endpoint using HTTP. This integration ensures that you never miss an opportunity to engage with new leads, enhancing your outreach efforts and improving your overall marketing strategy. Perfect for businesses looking to automate their lead management and communication workflows.
